summary: This is an email chain from June 23, 2020, discussing operational planning for the anticipated indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020. It includes coordination between law enforcement regarding a GPS warrant and mentions Maxwell's passport information.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email subject and body reference her passports and the plan for her indictment on June 29, 2020.

events.title: Planned Maxwell Indictment
events.description: The email states that "Southern won't budge on Monday indictment 6/29," indicating a planned or anticipated indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell on that date.

events.title: Operational Planning for Arrest
events.description: Law enforcement officials coordinate to prepare for the anticipated indictment, including reaching out to tech people to be ready once a GPS warrant is signed.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated June 23, 2020, and discusses plans for an indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell scheduled for June 29, 2020.
The communication involves coordination between the FBI New York and the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The subject line and body reference Ghislaine Maxwell's US and UK/foreign passport numbers.
The plan includes preparing a GPS warrant and ensuring technical teams are ready to execute it upon signing.
The tone indicates a firm, non-negotiable indictment date from the Southern District of New York.
